name: Skully's Haunted Mansion
description:
This is a Halloween themed dungeon type game where you play as Skully who traverses a haunted mansion in search of candy. Skully has to sacrifice the pumpkins scattered around the levels to progress further in the mansion. 

The game was made for the Spooktober Game Jam 2021 and was made in one week. 

How To Play:

 WASD: To Move Left and Right Arrows to turn camera 

Game Controller left stick to move

 Game Controller Right Stick to move camera 

Space Bar to fire fireball attack

 F key to interact with portal doors

-Options menu does not work

Game Designer/Programmer - Jonathan Torres

Game Artist - Gara Khachadour

 Sound Designer - Jonathan Urso

Known issues that will be fixed:
 - Health bar does not update

 - Ghost die to fast

 - Player takes to little damage

 - Options menu does not work

 - Falling off the map does not respawn the player (try not to fall off)
